holidays.title: Random Act of Kindness Day
holidays.description: Want to change the world? Start with a random act of kindness!

holidays.title: Analog to Digital TV Day
holidays.description: Take some time to appreciate the brilliance of digital T.Vs and what they do.

holidays.title: Brazil Carnival
holidays.description: Brazil Carnival is a festival held before Ash Wednesday, which hosts many colorful events.

holidays.title: Champion Crab Races Day
holidays.description: Include crabs in your diet and crab races in your list of fun things to do.

holidays.title: February 17th Revolution
holidays.description: Look back on the events of the Libyan Revolution, and how this changed the nation.

holidays.title: Kosovo Independence Day
holidays.description: Rewind the hands of time and close in on Kosovo's historic road to freedom.

holidays.title: Libyan Revolution Day
holidays.description: Libyan Revolution Day: The Bloody Revolt that shook and catapulted Libya to freedom.

holidays.title: My Way Day
holidays.description: The crowd is a bore! Live by your own rules on My Way Day!

holidays.title: National Cabbage Day
holidays.description: Get your kitchen gear ready as we explore the unexplored world of cabbages.

holidays.title: National Cafe au Lait Day
holidays.description: Treat your taste buds to this warm, heavenly delight on National Cafe au Lait Day!

holidays.title: National Caregivers Day
holidays.description: We honor individuals who selflessly provide physical-and emotional support to those who need it most.

holidays.title: National Public Science Day
holidays.description: Get acquainted with the science topics and issues that influence our everyday lives.

holidays.title: National Tennis Pro Day
holidays.description: It’s time to give credit to the ones that taught us to ace the game.

holidays.title: No One Eats Alone Day
holidays.description: Sit with the loneliest kid and share your meal with him or her as you bond.

holidays.title: Who Shall I Be Day
holidays.description: Let us explore the importance of setting future goals and start working for a brighter future.

holidays.title: World Human Spirit Day
holidays.description: Celebrate World Human Spirit Day in zen-full fashion! Meditate, be thankful, and stay confident.

holidays.title: Alex Vargas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Vargas has continued to share his talent with the world after leaving his band, Vagabond.

holidays.title: Billie Joe Armstrong’s Birthday
holidays.description: Billie Joe Armstrong is a part-time father and a full-time rock star.

holidays.title: Bonnie Wright’s Birthday
holidays.description: Do you know just how magical Bonnie Wright is? Learn more about her here.

holidays.title: David Goggins’s Birthday
holidays.description: Military man, endurance athlete, and author; there is nothing David Goggins can’t do.

holidays.title: Michael Jordan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Michael Jordan ultimately took a break from basketball to play minor-league baseball.

holidays.title: Paris Hilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: A multifaceted woman who has ventured into over five fields and excelled in all of them.

holidays.title: Rene Russo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Supermodel, actress, producer, and more, Rene Russo is a star whose talents seem endless!
